# navigationType

**Instance Property**

The type of action that triggered the navigation.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var navigationType: WKNavigationType { get }
```

## Discussion

The value is one of the constants of the enumerated type [doc://com.apple.webkit/documentation/WebKit/WKNavigationType].

## Getting the navigation type

- **WKNavigationType**: The type of action that triggered the navigation.
